about-description: We are a modern restaurant offering the best dishes from around the world.
about-team-description: Our team consists of experienced chefs and friendly staff.
home-description: Experience the taste of tradition and innovation. We serve premium dishes made from fresh, local ingredients with love and care.
terms-description: By using our service, you agree to the terms of use. All orders are subject to availability and local delivery rules. We reserve the right to change pricing or menu items at any time. Please read carefully before proceeding.
